com.defano.jmonet.transform.image

Class RubbersheetTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.transform.image.RubbersheetTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageTransform

    public class RubbersheetTransform
extends Object
implements ImageTransform
    Performs a rubber-sheet projection of the source image onto an arbitrary quadrilateral.

    This transform implicitly applies a scale transform to the source image to assure its dimensions equal the dimensions of the quadrilateral its being projected onto.

    The transform further depends on certain geometric limitations that are present in the Quadrilateral class; the quadrilateral cannot be self-intersecting, for example.

    This magical incantation of linear algebra is as described by CorrMap: http://www.corrmap.com/features/rubber-sheeting_transformation.php

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public BufferedImage apply(BufferedImage input)
        Applies a transform operation to the given image, producing a new, transformed image. This method does not destroy or otherwise mutate the source image. Note that this operation may return an image whose dimensions differ from the source image. See StaticImageTransform for a transform which maintains source dimensions.
        Specified by:
        apply in interface ImageTransform
        Parameters:
        input - The source image to which the transform should be applied.
        Returns:
        A new, transformed image.
